text: Dughiar mamɨn, Atrivim Devit uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko ghua Jerusalem iniasa mɨsosi. Jerusalem a Jebusian nguibamra. Jebusia ghaze, Devit men nguibam inian kogham, egha me dɨbovir akabar a mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ia bar en nguibar ekiamɨn aven izan kogham. Gumazir damazir okavɨrɨziba ko suer amɨraziba, me pura izɨ ia izamin tuavim apɨrigham.”
